definition: to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Those opinions and propositions were agreed upon and echoed by many participating leaders.
sentences.chinese: 这些观点和主张得到许多与会领导人的赞同和呼应。

sentences.english: The drum of water current concuss , in the heart of aery absentminded, exactly is who is act in cooperation who?
sentences.chinese: 水流的鼓荡，心中的飘渺恍惚，到底是谁在呼应着谁？

sentences.english: Naive gatehouse stand in bluestone steps, tile-roofed house with the door tall and echoes.
sentences.chinese: 素朴的门楼立在青石台阶上，同门内高大瓦房相呼应。

sentences.english: The film is in lurid colors, a pulp counterpoint to the elegance of the action.
sentences.chinese: 影片的色彩浓的逼人，森森鬼气呼应着优雅的动作。

sentences.english: These comments echo the idea that space exploration is our Manifest Destiny.
sentences.chinese: 这些评论呼应的想法认为太空探索是我们注定的命运。

sentences.english: Golden color is picked to symbolize wealth, in consistency with the financial media properties of ones.
sentences.chinese: 使用象征财富的金色，呼应金融媒体钜亨网的特质。

sentences.english: Paul finished this epistle right where he began.
sentences.chinese: 保罗以首尾呼应的方式，来结束这封书信。

sentences.english: Especially i felt this when i made any attempt to propitiate him .
sentences.chinese: 我想抚慰他时尤其感到这点，我的同情得不到呼应。

sentences.english: I have told you of her attempts to propitiate M.
sentences.chinese: 我想抚慰他时尤其感到这点，我的同情得不到呼应。

sentences.english: The difference between these three techniques is the different ways of the tone and mood correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 三种呼应的区别在于呼应中声气感应的方法不同。

sentences.english: The difference between these three techniques is the different ways of the tone and mood correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 三种呼应的区别在于呼应中声气感应的方法不同。

sentences.english: The rumble of distant thunder seemed to echo my inner turmoil.
sentences.chinese: 远处轰鸣的雷声似乎在呼应我内心的混乱。

sentences.english: "I, too, " echoed the buttercup, the cornflower, the poppy, and the clover.
sentences.chinese: “我也”，呼应了毛茛的矢车菊，罂粟和三叶草。

sentences.english: Each half reaction responds to the interfacial potential at the corresponding electrode .
sentences.chinese: 每个半反应都与相应电极上的界面电势差相呼应。

sentences.english: The prelude and coda echo from beginning to end.

definition: to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
to fuse together (idiom)/hypostatic union (religion)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to blend into one another/to blend together well
to contrast/to set off one another/to go well with
conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
to decorate/to adorn/sprinkled/studded/only for show
concise/succinct/pithy
to complement one another (idiom)
ingenious/clever/ingenuity/artifice
to paint a dragon and dot in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
sketchy/concise/abbreviated
color contrast
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
hue/tone
